name: simen-speech-recognizer
description: Apple Speech Framework native binding for Node.js

scripts.build:swift: cd src/native && MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=13.0 swiftc -O -parse-as-library -c AppleSpeech.swift -o AppleSpeech.o
scripts.prebuild:mac: npm run build:swift && cd src/native && npm install && npx node-gyp rebuild && cd ../.. && node scripts/copy-native.js darwin-arm64

author: Simen
